mapper.select: SELECT id, type, rate, remark, create_by, update_by, DATE_FORMAT( STR_TO_DATE( CONCAT(cre_date, cre_time), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s' ), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AS cre_date, DATE_FORMAT( STR_TO_DATE( CONCAT(up_date, up_time), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s' ), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AS up_date FROM t_sys_param_rate where id=#{param_rate_id}
mapper.insert: insert into t_sys_param_rate( type, rate, remark, create_by, cre_date, cre_time )values( #{map.type}, #{map.rate}, #{map.remark}, #{map.create_by}, #{map.cre_date}, #{map.cre_time} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM t_sys_param_rate where type=#{type} AND CAST(rate AS DECIMAL) = CAST(#{rate} AS DECIMAL)
SELECT id,type,rate FROM t_sys_param_rate where type=#{type} order by rate
